thread.title: SPIN-TASTIC! Claire McCaskill sends heads to desks explaining why she wasn’t ‘precise’
thread.title_full: SPIN-TASTIC! Claire McCaskill sends heads to desks explaining why she wasn’t ‘precise’

author: Doug P.
title: SPIN-TASTIC! Claire McCaskill sends heads to desks explaining why she wasn’t ‘precise’
text:
SPIN-TASTIC! Claire McCaskill sends heads to desks explaining why she wasn’t ‘precise’ Posted at 4:24 pm on March 2, 2017 by Doug P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Earlier today, after Sen. Claire McCaskill claimed that she’d never met, in-person meeting or by phone, with the Russian ambassador. It didn’t take long for McCaskill’s own tweets to disprove her claim . Now the Missouri senator’s saying she couldn’t be as concise as she should have been because of… Twitter’s character limit: McCaskill blamed Twitter limit on her tweet. "140 characters are tough. The word 'from' should have been in there but I didn't have room." 
— Ashley Killough (@KilloughCNN) March 2, 2017 McCaskill clarifies to @KilloughCNN : She never met "one-on-one" with the Russian ambassador; says Twitter limit didn't let her be precise 
— Manu Raju (@mkraju) March 2, 2017 
Apparently sometimes the truth can’t fit into 140 characters or less. "I didn't have enough characters to tell the truth" is a new one. Imma try that https://t.co/ZhKDUlEv8O 
— Logan Dobson (@LoganDobson) March 2, 2017 @KilloughCNN @baseballcrank "I tried to make a technically true but misleading statement but had to leave out the technically true part" 
— Josiah Neeley (@jneeley78)   Oopsie! Up to 30 Democrats should resign for meeting with Russian diplomats in 2015 
Here’s how McCaskill tried to clarify her earlier tweet. Notice how things have evolved slightly: Again, As senior member of Armed Serv, never received call or request from Russian Amb for meeting. Never met one on one w/him. 
— Claire McCaskill (@clairecmc) March 2, 2017 4 years ago went to meeting of many Senators about international adoptions. Russian Amb also attended. 
— Claire McCaskill (@clairecmc) March 2, 2017 
Keep digging! Weird, @clairecmc , how this went from "meeting with" to "also attended," isn't it? Guess facts are malleable based on your political need. pic.twitter.com/VBHXd7pywZ 
— Derek Hunter (@derekahunter) March 2, 2017 @clairecmc So you lied in your original tweet.
